```python
import os
import base64
import requests
import yaml

# Input parameters
org = "drulacosmin"
repo_names = ["repo1", "repo2"]
file_path = ".github/workflows/google.yml"
access_token = "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"
replace_string = "workflows-testing"
branch_name = "main"

# Set the API endpoint and headers
api_url = "https://api.github.com"
headers = {
    "Accept": "application/vnd.github+json",
    "Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "User-Agent": "python"
}

# Loop over the repo_names list and modify the YAML file in each repository
for repo_name in repo_names:
    # Get the repository object
    repo_url = f"{api_url}/repos/{org}/{repo_name}"
    repo_res = requests.get(repo_url, headers=headers)
    repo_res.raise_for_status()
    repo = repo_res.json()
    print(f"Repository(full_name=\"{repo['full_name']}\")")

    # Get the branch object
    branch_url = f"{api_url}/repos/{org}/{repo_name}/branches/{branch_name}"
    branch_res = requests.get(branch_url, headers=headers)
    branch_res.raise_for_status()
    branch = branch_res.json()

    # Get the file content from the repository
    file_url = f"{api_url}/repos/{org}/{repo_name}/contents/{file_path}?ref={branch_name}"
    file_res = requests.get(file_url, headers=headers)
    file_res.raise_for_status()
    file_content = base64.b64decode(file_res.json()["content"]).decode("utf-8")

    # Create a temporary directory
    temp_dir = 'TEMP_folder'
    if not os.path.exists(temp_dir):
        os.mkdir(temp_dir)

    # Create a temporary file in the directory
    temp_file_path = os.path.join(temp_dir, os.path.basename(file_path))
    with open(temp_file_path, 'w') as f:
        f.write(file_content)

    # Modify the YAML file content
    os.system(f"yq e '.on.push.branches = [\"Build and Release\"]' -i {temp_file_path}")

    # Get the modified file content
    with open(temp_file_path, 'r') as f:
        modified_file_content = f.read()

    # Rename the original file
    original_file_path = file_path + '_OLD'
    os.rename(file_path, original_file_path)

    # Save the modified file with the original name
    with open(file_path, 'w') as f:
        f.write(modified_file_content)

    # Upload the modified file to the repository
    commit_message = f"Add {file_path} with Build and Release branch"
    update_url = f"{api_url}/repos/{org}/{repo_name}/contents/{file_path}"
    update_res = requests.put(update_url, headers=headers, json={
        "message": commit_message,
        "content": base64.b64encode(modified_file_content.encode()).decode()
    })
    update_res.raise_for_status()
    print("Workflow file updated")

    # Remove the temporary file and directory
    os.remove(temp_file_path)
    os.rmdir(temp_dir)

    # Remove the original file
    os.remove(original_file_path)
```
Note that this script modifies the `branches` value of the YAML file to `["Build and Release"]` using `yq` command, creates a temporary directory and file,
